scripts.frontend: set PORT=5173 && npm run start --prefix project/frontend
scripts.backend: powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { Set-Location project/backend; python -m uvicorn server:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 }"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n frontend,backend -c green,blue "npm run frontend" "npm run backend"
